about_the_game:
Mangút is a single-player platform adventure without combat, featuring a narrative that unveils the daily life of app delivery workers.

In this game, you play as Gil, a grumpy and persistent hedgehog struggling financially. In the delivery app, he finds a way to earn money to support his family, embarking on a journey filled with sweat, challenges, and unexpected twists.

Swing across the platforms with a mechanical arm, dare to make tough decisions, and lead a revolution in Morro do Mangút.

 

Engaging Narrative

  • Presents the dilemmas and challenges faced by a favela's worker;

  • Explores themes such as entrepreneurship, meritocracy, and revolution;

  • Features diverse and deep characters with contrasting worldviews;

  • "Caramel" mutt.

 

High-Speed Precision Platformer

  • Run, jump, dash, and swing through the scenario with boldness and fun;

  • Complete deliveries as quickly as possible without damaging the cargo to satisfy your customers and optimize your earnings;

  • Includes 36 levels with dozens of challenges, platforms, and secret areas for you to explore and showcase your skills.

 

Decision-Making

  • Choices in dialogues impact Gil's relationships with other characters and can affect gameplay;

  • Encounter characters during levels: they may offer interesting side quests;

  • Use the money you earn strategically to pay the bills at the end of each day.

 

A Retrofuturistic Brazil

  • Gil has a mechanical arm prosthesis powered by energy, which can stretch and interact creatively with the environmental elements;

  • The game features characters, settings, and a soundtrack that are typically Brazilian, reimagined with steampunk and cyberpunk elements;

  • There are 4 unique scenarios: the favela Morro do Mangút, a forest in the city's upscale area, an open TV studio, and a drone factory with precarious working conditions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or similar with 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c or superior
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 or similar with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c or superior
  • VR Support: No
